content.value: To everyone who has made it this far, I give you my thanks. You're brilliant. Even if you only ended up reading a bit of it, you're still brilliant (although you won't know that because you're not reading this).

With Making Games Is Fun, we're really trying to do something different: the idea is to create portraits of videogames people that go beyond a single photograph, which is why I decided to create a photodocumentary with writing. We are working on a second series of Making Games Is Fun as you read this, some teaser snippets of which you can see on this page.
I've flown the Hello Games nest and have plans to create portraits of indie people and studios involving more elements, the scope of which will increase as support increases.
Thanks again for reading and get ready for more Making Games Is Fun.
